languages.text: "Техножрец сказал: "Как пройдешь тыщу шагов, втыкай волшебный щуп в землю, совершай молитву и жми на смарагдовую печать. Затем трижды читай благодатницу Императору и жми рубиновую печать. Так щуп землю испробует и скажет, хто из минералов в ей живет".

"The Tech-Priest told me, 'Once a thousand steps you have walked, thrust the mystical probe into the soil, say a prayer, then press the smaragdine seal. Offer three prayers to the Emperor, then press the ruby seal. Thus will the probe test the land and tell you what minerals dwell therein.'"
languages.original_text: "Техножрец сказал: "Как пройдешь тыщу шагов, втыкай волшебный щуп в землю, совершай молитву и жми на смарагдовую печать. Затем трижды читай благодатницу Императору и жми рубиновую печать. Так щуп землю испробует и скажет, хто из минералов в ей живет".

traits.locale_text: "The Tech-Priest told me, 'Once a thousand steps you have walked, thrust the mystical probe into the soil, say a prayer, then press the smaragdine seal. Offer three prayers to the Emperor, then press the ruby seal. Thus will the probe test the land and tell you what minerals dwell therein.'"
traits.speaker: OldMan

Offer three prayers to the Emperor, then press the ruby seal. Thus will the probe test the land and tell you what minerals dwell therein.'"

languages.text: “那个技术神甫告诉我，说走完一千步之后，就把这根长针插进土里，祈祷几句，之后按下上面的印记。之后向帝皇祈祷三次，然后按下红宝石的印章。这样，这根长针就可以探测这片土地，发现这里藏着什么矿藏。”
languages.original_text: "The Tech-Priest told me, 'Once a thousand steps you have walked, thrust the mystical probe into the soil, say a prayer, then press the smaragdine seal. Offer three prayers to the Emperor, then press the ruby seal. Thus will the probe test the land and tell you what minerals dwell therein.'"

traits.locale_text: “那个技术祭司告诉我，说走完一千步之后，就把这根长针插进土里，祈祷几句，之后按下上面的印记。之后向帝皇祈祷三次，然后按下红宝石的印章。这样，这根长针就可以探测这片土地，发现这里藏着什么矿藏。”
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: 「技術司祭が言っていました。”1000歩歩くたびに、神秘のプローブを土に刺し、祈りを捧げ 、スマラグダインの印を押せ。3つの祈りを皇帝に捧げ、ルビーのの印を押せ。プローブは土を調査して、含まれているミネラルを教えてくれる”と」
languages.original_text: "The Tech-Priest told me, 'Once a thousand steps you have walked, thrust the mystical probe into the soil, say a prayer, then press the smaragdine seal. Offer three prayers to the Emperor, then press the ruby seal. Thus will the probe test the land and tell you what minerals dwell therein.'"

traits.locale_text: 「技術司祭が言っていました。”1000歩歩くたびに、神秘のプローブを土に刺し、祈りを捧げ 、スマラグダインの印を押せ。3つの祈りを皇帝に捧げ、ルビーのの印を押せ。プローブは土を調査して、含まれているミネラルを教えてくれる”と」
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: «El tecnosacerdote me dijo: "Una vez recorra mil pasos, clave la sonda mística, pronuncie la plegaria y pulse el sello esmeralda. Ofrezca tres plegarias al Emperador y pulse el sello de rubí. Entonces, la sonda analizará el terreno y le informará de qué minerales contiene"».
languages.original_text: "The Tech-Priest told me, 'Once a thousand steps you have walked, thrust the mystical probe into the soil, say a prayer, then press the smaragdine seal. Offer three prayers to the Emperor, then press the ruby seal. Thus will the probe test the land and tell you what minerals dwell therein.'"

traits.locale_text: «El tecnosacerdote me dijo: "Una vez recorra mil pasos, clave la sonda mística, pronuncie la plegaria y pulse el sello esmeralda. Ofrezca tres plegarias al Emperador y pulse el sello de rubí. Entonces, la sonda analizará el terreno y le informará de qué minerales contiene"».
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: "Der Techpriester hat mir gesagt: 'Eintausend Schritte seid Ihr gegangen, stecht die mystische Sonde in den Boden, sprecht ein Gebet, dann drückt auf das Smaragdsiegel. Betet dreimal zum Imperator, dann drückt das Rubinsiegel. So prüft die Sonde das Land und sagt Euch, welche Mineralien darin schlummern.'"
languages.original_text: "The Tech-Priest told me, 'Once a thousand steps you have walked, thrust the mystical probe into the soil, say a prayer, then press the smaragdine seal. Offer three prayers to the Emperor, then press the ruby seal. Thus will the probe test the land and tell you what minerals dwell therein.'"

traits.locale_text: "Der Techpriester hat mir gesagt: 'Eintausend Schritte seid Ihr gegangen, stecht die mystische Sonde in den Boden, sprecht ein Gebet, dann drückt auf das Smaragdsiegel. Betet dreimal zum Imperator, dann drückt das Rubinsiegel. So prüft die Sonde das Land und sagt Euch, welche Mineralien darin schlummern.'"
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: « Le technoprêtre m'a dit : "Tous les mille pas, plante la sonde mythique dans le sol, prononce une prière, puis appuie sur le sceau smaragdin. Offre trois prières à l'Empereur, puis appuie sur le sceau de rubis. Ainsi, la sonde analysera la terre et te dira quels minéraux elle renferme." »
languages.original_text: "The Tech-Priest told me, 'Once a thousand steps you have walked, thrust the mystical probe into the soil, say a prayer, then press the smaragdine seal. Offer three prayers to the Emperor, then press the ruby seal. Thus will the probe test the land and tell you what minerals dwell therein.'"

traits.locale_text: « Le technoprêtre m'a dit : "Tous les mille pas, plante la sonde mythique dans le sol, prononce une prière, puis appuie sur le sceau smaragdin. Offre trois prières à l'Empereur, puis appuie sur le sceau de rubis. Ainsi, la sonde analysera la terre et te dira quels minéraux elle renferme." »
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: "Tekno Rahip söyledi. 'Önce bin arşın yol alacaksın. Sonra mistik çubuğu yere batıracaksın. Duanı okuyacak, zümrüt mühre bastıracaksın. İmparator adına üç dua okuyacaksın, yakut mührü bastıracaksın. Böylece çubuk, toprağın sırlarına nail olacak. Barındırdığı mineralleri sana anlatacak.' dedi."
languages.original_text: "The Tech-Priest told me, 'Once a thousand steps you have walked, thrust the mystical probe into the soil, say a prayer, then press the smaragdine seal. Offer three prayers to the Emperor, then press the ruby seal. Thus will the probe test the land and tell you what minerals dwell therein.'"

traits.locale_text: "Tekno Rahip söyledi. "Önce bin arşın yol alacaksın. Sonra mistik çubuğu yere batıracaksın. Duanı okuyacak, zümrüt mühre bastıracaksın. İmparator adına üç dua okuyacaksın, yakut mührü bastıracaksın. Böylece çubuk, toprağın sırlarına nail olacak. Barındırdığı mineralleri sana anlatacak', dedi."
traits.speaker: OldMan
